body_content.explanation: a mixture containing different vegetables cooked with vinegar, sugar, and spices, eaten cold, especially with meat or cheese:
examples: a sandwich with pulled pork, smoked ham, chow-chow relish, and spicy mustard
There are sweet and tangy piccalillis, chutneys, and chow-chows.
My tomatoes are not ripe yet so I cannot make the chowchow I had planned.
The typical pickle was replaced here with an overflowing spoonful of chow chow, a southern relish.
